contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox settlement |name = Xincai County |translit_lang1 = [[Chinese character|Chinese]] |translit_lang1_type = [[Chinese character|Chinese]] |translit_lang1_info = 新蔡县 |translit_lang1_type1 = [[Pinyin]] |translit_lang1_info1 = Xīncài Xiàn |postal_code_type = Postal code |settlement_type = [[County (People's Republic of China)|County]] |image_skyline = |image_map = |map_caption = Location of the county |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = [[People's Republic of China|China]] |subdivision_type1 = Province |subdivision_name1 = [[Henan]] |subdivision_type2 = Prefecture |subdivision_name2 = [[Zhumadian]] |area_total_km2 = 1453 |population = |population_as_of = |population_density_km2 = auto |population_total = 1042000 |latNS = |latd = |latm = |lats = |leader_name = 贾国印 Jiǎ Guóyìn |leader_name1 = 王景峰 Wáng Jíngfēng |leader_title = [[Communist Party of China|CPC]] County Party Secretary |leader_title1 = County Magistrate |longEW = |longd = |longm = |longs = |elevation_ft = |elevation_m = |timezone = [[China Standard Time|China Standard]] |utc_offset = +8 |website = http://www.xincai.gov.cn/index.asp }} '''Xincai County''' ({{zh|c=[[wikt:新蔡|新蔡]][[wikt:县|县]]|p=Xīncài Xiàn}}; [[Chinese Postal Map Romanization|Postal map spelling]]: Sintsai) is a county of [[Henan]], [[China]]. It is under the administration of [[Zhumadian]] city. ==Administrative divisions== The [[County (People's Republic of China)|county]] of Xincai administers 9 towns and 13 villages. *[[Gulu, Henan|Gulu]] Town (古吕镇) *[[Tangcun, Xincai County|Tangcun]] Town (棠村镇) *[[Liancun]] Town (练村镇) *(李桥回族镇) *佛阁寺镇 *龙口镇 *砖店镇 *[[Hanji, Henan|Hanji]] Town (韩集镇) *(陈店镇) *[[Yangzhuanghu]] Village (杨庄户乡) *(余店乡) *(弥陀寺乡) *[[Huanglou]] (黄楼乡) *[[Hewu]] (河坞乡) *(栎城乡) *[[Jiantou]] (涧头乡) *[[Songgang]] (宋岗乡) *(顿岗乡) *(关津乡) *(孙召乡) *[[Huazhuang]] (化庄乡) *[[Shilipu]] (十里铺乡) ==External links== *[http://www.xincai.gov.cn/zjxc.asp Area & Population source] {{County-level divisions of Henan}} {{coord|32|44|56|N|114|59|06|E|region:CN-41_type:adm2nd_source:kolossus-dewiki|display=title}} [[Category:County-level divisions of Henan]] {{Henan-geo-stub}}
